name: KOUR
description:
KOUR is a short first person 3d platformer. 

-15 LEVELS / TIME TRIALS

-PARKOUR MECHANICS  (WALLRUN, WALLCLIMB, SLIDE, COIL, VAULT, MANTLE)

-SILLY. WEIRD. ART

-BANGER ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK w/17 SONGS! +7 BONUS SONGS  ( https://ezhno.bandcamp.com/music)

This game is my first real attempt at gamedev. Thank  you for checking this out!
